00020                 public function kill_claudio()
00021                 {
00022                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00023 
00024                         $conn->prepare('DELETE FROM `visits` ' .
00025                                 'WHERE `params` LIKE "%\'_u\' => \'claudio\'%" ' .
00026                                 'OR `params` LIKE "%\'email\' => \'claudio@emeraldion.it\'%"');
00027                         $conn->exec();
00028 
00029                         $conn->prepare('OPTIMIZE TABLE `visits`');
00030                         $conn->exec();
00031 
00032                         $this->render(NULL);
00033 
00034                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00035                 }

00041                 public function update_macupdate_ratings()
00042                 {
00043                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00044 
00045                         error_reporting(E_ALL | E_STRICT);
00046 
00047                         // assume the definition of $theParser (a MURatingsParser object) as in the listing above
00048                         $RSS_PATH = 'http://www.macupdate.com/rss/ratings.php?id=2184:4f54cfceed571943d59ac7a951fc19e0';
00049                         // create the object, including the path to your RSS file
00050                         $theParser = new MURatingsParser($RSS_PATH);
00051                         // this may also be done in two steps, omitting the constructer argument:
00052                         // $theParser = new MURatingsParser();
00053                         // $theParser->file = $RSS_PATH;
00054 
00055                         // process the RSS file specified above (when the object was created)
00056                         $theParser->parseFile();
00057 
00058                         // get all the items from $theParser
00059                         $itemList = $theParser->ratingsList();
00060 
00061                         $mu_factory = new MacupdateEntry();
00062                         foreach ($itemList as $item)
00063                         {
00064                                 $results = $mu_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => '`mu_title` = \'' . $conn->escape($item['title']) . '\''));
00065                                 if (count($results) > 0)
00066                                 {
00067                                         $mu_entry = $results[0];
00068                                         $mu_entry->rating = $item['description'];
00069                                         $mu_entry->url = $item['link'];
00070                                         $mu_entry->save();
00071                                 }
00072                         }
00073                         $this->render(NULL);
00074 
00075                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00076                 }
00077 
00082                 public function update_mu_ratings()
00083                 {
00084                         $this->update_macupdate_ratings();
00085                 }
00086 
00091                 public function update_versiontracker_ratings()
00092                 {
00093                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00094 
00095                         error_reporting(E_ALL | E_STRICT);
00096 
00097                         $sw = new Software();
00098                         $softwares = $sw->find_all();
00099 
00100                         foreach ($softwares as $software)
00101                         {
00102                                 $software->has_one('version_tracker_entries');
00103 
00104                                 if ($software->version_tracker_entry &&
00105                                         $software->version_tracker_entry->vt_id != 0)
00106                                 {
00107                                         $vt = new VTRatingsParser($software->version_tracker_entry->vt_id);
00108                                         $vt->parse();
00109 
00110                                         $software->version_tracker_entry->rating = $vt->rating;
00111                                         $software->version_tracker_entry->save();
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114                         $this->render(NULL);
00115 
00116                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00117                 }
00118 
00123                 public function update_vt_ratings()
00124                 {
00125                         $this->update_versiontracker_ratings();
